context:
postoperative diagnosis:
tonsillitis.

procedure performed:
tonsillectomy.

anesthesia:
general endotracheal.
after induction of general endotracheal anesthesia, the mcivor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.
after induction of general endotracheal anesthesia, the mcivor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.
after induction of general endotracheal anesthesia, the mcivor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

two #12-french red rubber robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.
the anterior tonsillar pillar was infiltrated with 1.5 cc of 1% xylocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine, as was the left tonsillar pillar.

text: tonsil was grasped with the tenaculum and retracted out of its fossa
context: the right tonsil was grasped with the tenaculum and retracted out of its fossa.

text: anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with the #12 knife blade
context: the anterior tonsillar pillar was incised with the #12 knife blade.

text: plica semilunaris was incised with the metzenbaum scissors
context: the plica semilunaris was incised with the metzenbaum scissors.

text: tonsil was dissected free of its fossa
context: using the metzenbaum scissors and the fisher knife, the tonsil was dissected free of its fossa onto an inferior pedicle around which the tonsillar snare was placed and applied.

text: tonsillar snare was placed and applied
context: using the metzenbaum scissors and the fisher knife, the tonsil was dissected free of its fossa onto an inferior pedicle around which the tonsillar snare was placed and applied.

text: tonsil was removed from the fossa
context: the tonsil was removed from the fossa and the fossa packed with a cherry gauze sponge as previously described.

text: fossa packed with a cherry gauze sponge
context: the tonsil was removed from the fossa and the fossa packed with a cherry gauze sponge as previously described.
by a similar procedure, the opposite tonsillectomy was performed and the fossa was packed.
by a similar procedure, the opposite tonsillectomy was performed and the fossa was packed.
attention was re-directed to the right tonsil. the pack was removed and bleeding was controlled with the suction bovie unit.

text: bleeding was controlled with the suction bovie unit
context: the pack was removed and bleeding was controlled with the suction bovie unit.

text: bleeding was  controlled in the left tonsillar fossa
context: bleeding was then similarly controlled in the left tonsillar fossa and the nasopharynx after removal of the packs.
bleeding was then similarly controlled in the left tonsillar fossa and the nasopharynx after removal of the packs.
the catheters were then removed.

text: nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris
context: the nasal passages and oropharynx were suctioned free of debris.
